text:
Order a SIM card online here [https://www.telus.com/en/mobility/configure?product=bring-your-own-device&linktype=ge-meganav?INTCMP=Tcom_VirtualAssistant&linktype=virtual_assistant]
1. Select ""Proceed to next step"".
2. Select ""Add a line"" and log into your account.
3. Pick your perfect plan and select ""Proceed to summary"".
From there, make sure to review your order and complete your check out.

The [device_name_model1] has a X inch screen, comes with XXX GB, and costs $XX/month + taxes upfront (over 24 months at 0% interest on approved credit with TELUS Easy Payment®).

The [device_name_model2] has a X inch screen, comes with XXX GB, and costs $XX/month + taxes upfront (over 24 months at 0% interest on approved credit with TELUS Easy Payment®).
